hCalendar 11a - extracting organizer and attendee without using hCard test

This page was designed to test the extraction of organizer and attendee information from hCalendar without using hCard.

From: hCalendar test suite 1.0

Author: Lawrence Woodman

Tests:

Test Result Comment
vevent[0].organizer IsEqualTo("John Doe") The organizer value
vevent[0].attendee[1] IsEqualTo("Jane Doe") The attendee value

History:

  • Created: 23 May 2011 by Lawrence Woodman
Web Standards meet up
Starts: 1 June
1.example.com
Organizer:
John Doe
Attendees:
  • Peter Doe
  • Jane Doe
